DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study verify existence neuromuscular neutral zone ( NNZs ) human , develop non-invasive technique measure intervertebral kinematics lumbar spine . The result use accurately quantify NNZs human , provide foundation clinical trial low back pain patient use methodology .
